attributes.action: back the decision of the football league to deduct 15 points from Leeds United
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United were found guilty by the football authorities of breaching rules and deliberately tried to gain advantage over other clubs by carefully selecting the date of going into administration. In this case Government and other bodies have no cause to interfere with this punishment.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
